data.text: ＜Sirius＞ was once again aiming for the Spring Trophyー
data.processed: <story>＜Sirius＞ was once again aiming for the Spring Trophyー

data.text:
As if to prove those words weren't a lie, 
Special Week continued to put in the effort.
data.processed:
<story>As if to prove those words weren't a lie, 
<story>Special Week continued to put in the effort.

data.text:
For the sake of supporting her, there was only 
one thing on my mind, the [Spring Tenno Sho].
data.processed:
<story>For the sake of supporting her, there was only 
<story>one thing on my mind, the [Spring Tenno Sho].

data.text:
However, for her, a member of the team that wanted 
to make the race special, the feeling of "Wanting 
to Take the Trophy" grew stronger.
data.processed:
<story>However, for her, a member of the team that wanted 
<story>to make the race special, the feeling of "Wanting 
<story>to Take the Trophy" grew stronger.

data.text: And then――
data.processed: <story>And then――

data.text:
Bathed in sunlight, the Kyoto race course！ 
Aiming for the glory of the trophy, 12 Uma Musume have gathered！
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Bathed in sunlight, the Kyoto race course！ 
<story>Aiming for the glory of the trophy, 12 Uma Musume have gathered！

data.text:
As expected, the center of attention 
is last year's champion, Mejiro Bright！
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>As expected, the center of attention 
<story>is last year's champion, Mejiro Bright！

data.text:
And then we have the challengers from the "Golden 
Generation", the Kikka Sho Uma Musume Seiun Sky, 
and the Derby Uma Musume Special Week!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>And then we have the challengers from the "Golden 
<story>Generation", the Kikka Sho Uma Musume Seiun Sky, 
<story>and the Derby Uma Musume Special Week!

data.text:
In this three-way battle, what result awaits us, 
as the crowded stands gaze on with bated breath！？
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>In this three-way battle, what result awaits us, 
<story>as the crowded stands gaze on with bated breath！？

data.text:
Spe-chan, do your best out there! Just like with McQueen, we're 
expecting the ultimate [Spring Tenno Sho]!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan, do your best out there! Just like with McQueen, we're 
<story>expecting the ultimate [Spring Tenno Sho]!

data.text:
I'm thinkin' of winnin' this race someday too！ 
So get out there and help raise this emotion to the max！
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>I'm thinkin' of winnin' this race someday too！ 
<story>So get out there and help raise this emotion to the max！

data.text: Yeah！ I'll live up to those expectations！
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah！ I'll live up to those expectations！

data.text: (Diiiing……♪)
data.processed: <story>(Diiiing……♪)

data.text: Hm？ Was that Spe's phone？
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Hm？ Was that Spe's phone？

data.text: Ah！ It's a message from Suzuka-san！
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ah！ It's a message from Suzuka-san！

data.text:
Let's see…… 『I'll be cheering you on. Do your best, Spe-chin』……。 
……Spe-chin?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Let's see…… 『I'll be cheering you on. Do your best, Spe-chin』……。 
<story>……Spe-chin?

data.text:
It's the middle of the night over there, 
she's probably half-asleep and hit the wrong key……。
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>It's the middle of the night over there, 
<story>she's probably half-asleep and hit the wrong key……。

data.text:
Fufuu, half asleep but still frantically cheering you on, 
she must have really wanted to make sure that you knew.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, half asleep but still frantically cheering you on, 
<story>she must have really wanted to make sure that you knew.

data.text: We'll cheer you on lots too……！
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>We'll cheer you on lots too……！

data.text: Do your best, Special Week-san！
data.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
data.processed: <story>Do your best, Special Week-san！

data.text: We believe you'll be the one to cross the goal first！
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>We believe you'll be the one to cross the goal first！

data.text:
Your form during training was the best so far, 
all that's left is to have confidence in yourself, 
the results will definitely follow.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Show us you can take that trophy！
Show us you can take that trophy！

data.processed:
<story>Your form during training was the best so far, 
<story>all that's left is to have confidence in yourself, 
<story>the results will definitely follow.

data.text:
Your form during training was the best so far, 
all that's left is to have confidence in yourself, 
the results will definitely follow.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Show us you can take that trophy！
Show us you can take that trophy！

data.processed:
<story>Your form during training was the best so far, 
<story>all that's left is to have confidence in yourself, 
<story>the results will definitely follow.

data.text:
Yeah! My Moms' dream, my own dream, and with everyone's feelings 
giving me strength, I'll definitely win!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! My Moms' dream, my own dream, and with everyone's feelings 
<story>giving me strength, I'll definitely win!

data.text:
Yo, Spe-chan. We haven't been in the same race 
together since the 『Kikka Sho』, huh?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Yo, Spe-chan. We haven't been in the same race 
<story>together since the 『Kikka Sho』, huh?

data.text: Sei-chan
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Sei-chan

data.text: I won that time but, let's just see who'll win this time around。
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>I won that time but, let's just see who'll win this time around。

data.text: ……once again, the look on your face seems a little different。
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>……once again, the look on your face seems a little different。

data.text: Yeah, I've got a lot of expectations I need to live up to！
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, I've got a lot of expectations I need to live up to！

data.text: ……that's the same for me.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>……that's the same for me.

data.text:
No matter who my opponent is, I need only accomplish 
what I must…… that is how I feel。
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>No matter who my opponent is, I need only accomplish 
<story>what I must…… that is how I feel。

data.text:
However, before that, to Seiun Sky-sama…… and even before that to 
Special Week-sama, I fell behind.
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>However, before that, to Seiun Sky-sama…… and even before that to 
<story>Special Week-sama, I fell behind.

data.text:
Once again, to both of you from the "Golden Generation" 
with my deep respect, I shall be the one to stand 
at the top after this race……！
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed:
<story>Once again, to both of you from the "Golden Generation" 
<story>with my deep respect, I shall be the one to stand 
<story>at the top after this race……！

data.text:
I guess can't back down after all that, huh～? 
All that's left is to settle this with the race.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I guess can't back down after all that, huh～? 
<story>All that's left is to settle this with the race.

data.text: Yeah, with all our strength……！
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, with all our strength……！

data.text: That's just how I'd like it……！
data.name: Mejiro Bright
data.processed: <story>That's just how I'd like it……！

data.text: Well then, let's get going.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Well then, let's get going.

data.text:
Now, for these 12 excellent contestants, 
the curtain rises on this long 3200m battle！
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Now, for these 12 excellent contestants, 
<story>the curtain rises on this long 3200m battle！

data.text:
Will it be last year's champion who crosses the 
goal first?! Or will it be one from the "Golden 
Generation" that split the Classic crown?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Will it be last year's champion who crosses the 
<story>goal first?! Or will it be one from the "Golden 
<story>Generation" that split the Classic crown?!

data.text:
The Uma Musume have settled in their gates. 
The 『Spring Tenno Sho』 now ―― Begins！
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The Uma Musume have settled in their gates. 
<story>The 『Spring Tenno Sho』 now ―― Begins！
